Jordi Pont-Tuset

I'm from a small town near Girona, Catalunya. Currently in Zürich, Switzerland. Passionate about computer vision, technology, running, and mountains.

Twitter LinkedIn e-Mail G. Scholar

Me in a Nutshell

I am a mathematician, engineer, and PhD in computer vision by UPC Barcelonatech under the supervision of Prof. Ferran Marques.

During those years, I visited Prof. Jitendra Malik’s vision group in UC Berkeley, and I collaborated with the startup Fezoo.

I am currently doing an internship at Disney Research, Zürich, under the supervision of Prof. Aljoscha Smolic.
